data.name: Warmonger: Sins of the Naga
data.detailed_description:
Defend the world against a wicked alliance of Vampires, Reavers and Fungal Hivelords by using your defensive towers to manage a squad of fantasy soldiers to repel enemy invasions.

Travel the original fantasy world of the Stone, growing your army with each diplomatic decision ... and live with the consequences. Recruit armies of undead, mobile armour, living crystals and face the threat of the Twilight Alliance.

Key Features

  • Intense strategy that's as deep as it is wide
  • Replay it to make differant alliances and field a different army
  • Epic storyline that spans two continents
  • Iconic art style that will charm and delight
  • Advanced AI gives the battle an organic feel
  • 22 Heroes units that come with their own storylines, feats and battlefield techniques
  • 24 Unit types with distinct and powerful abilities
  • 4 Tower upgrades that allow you to specialise in cavalry, alchemy, sorcery and artillery
data.about_the_game:
Defend the world against a wicked alliance of Vampires, Reavers and Fungal Hivelords by using your defensive towers to manage a squad of fantasy soldiers to repel enemy invasions.

data.short_description: Gunpowder and Sorcery Squad-Based Tower Defense game made by just one person

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
